column1:
The  only  eye  witness  who's 
testimony 
is  very 
important  was

ordered  surety  bail. 
It  is  safe  to  infer  that  as  his  evidence  was  not
concluded on the first  day  and the fact  that the prosecution has made

an  application  to 
treat  him  as  an  adverse  witness,  on  the  evidence
adduced  by  him,  the  learned judge  may  have  decided  to  order  surety
bail.  One must not forget  that although  PW  5  is a  Notary  Public,  he is
